name: MagicMindReader
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: read my mind
des:
If you are performing a mind reading trick using a magic app by Benke Smith, this skill will reveal the word your spectator is merely thinking of.
You can watch a DEMO presentation here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tnSs9wsLvr0
